casebody.data:
Erin ISENBERG
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE, DIVISION OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY. No. 192P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Adam J. Hopler, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Isenberg, Erin. Sharon A. Johnston, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina Department of Commerce, Division of Employment Security. Adam James Hopler, Chief Counsel, for North Carolina Department of Commerce, Division of Employment Security. Jason J. Kaus, General Counsel, for North Carolina Department of Commerce, Division of Employment Security.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of June 2015 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
